HTMLCourse.name: Introduction to HTML
HTMLCourse.description: Learn the basics of HTML and how to structure a webpage.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Tags and Attributes
HTMLCourse.description: Understand HTML tags and attributes to build web content.

HTMLCourse.name: Creating Links and Lists in HTML
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to create hyperlinks and organize lists in HTML.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Tables: Structuring Data
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to use HTML tables to display data in a structured format.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Forms: Getting User Input
HTMLCourse.description: Understand how to create forms to collect user input on a webpage.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Images: Adding Visual Content
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to embed images in your HTML document for visual appeal.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Multimedia: Audio and Video
HTMLCourse.description: Discover how to embed audio and video in HTML.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Semantic Elements
HTMLCourse.description: Use semantic elements in HTML5 to create meaningful webpage structures.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Meta Tags and SEO
HTMLCourse.description: Understand how to use meta tags for better SEO and webpage visibility.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML Best Practices and Accessibility
HTMLCourse.description: Learn HTML best practices to ensure accessibility for all users.

CSSCourse.name: Introduction to CSS
CSSCourse.description: Get started with CSS and learn how to style a webpage.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Selectors and Properties
CSSCourse.description: Explore CSS selectors and properties to target and style elements.

CSSCourse.name: Styling Text with CSS
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to style text using CSS properties like color, font, and size.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Box Model
CSSCourse.description: Understand the CSS box model, including margins, borders, padding, and content.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Layout with Display and Position
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to control the layout of elements using CSS display and position properties.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Flexbox Basics
CSSCourse.description: Discover the fundamentals of CSS Flexbox for responsive layouts.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Grid Layout
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to use CSS Grid for complex, two-dimensional layouts.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Colors and Backgrounds
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to apply colors and background images in CSS.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Transitions and Animations
CSSCourse.description: Discover how to create smooth transitions and animations with CSS.

CSSCourse.name: Responsive Design with Media Queries
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to make your website responsive using CSS media queries.

JavaScriptCourse.name: Introduction to JavaScript
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn the basics of JavaScript and how it adds interactivity to web pages.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Variables and Data Types
JavaScriptCourse.description: Understand variables and data types to store and manipulate information.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Operators and Expressions
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn about operators and expressions to perform calculations and comparisons.

JavaScriptCourse.name: Control Flow in JavaScript: if-else and Switch
JavaScriptCourse.description: Master conditional statements to control the flow of your JavaScript code.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Loops: for and while
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how to use loops to execute code repeatedly in JavaScript.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Functions: Defining and Calling
JavaScriptCourse.description: Understand how to define and invoke functions to organize and reuse code.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Arrays: Working with Collections
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how to work with arrays to store multiple values in a single variable.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Objects: Key-Value Pairs
JavaScriptCourse.description: Discover how to use objects to structure data with key-value pairs.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript DOM Manipulation
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how to interact with and modify HTML elements using the DOM.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Events: Handling User Interaction
JavaScriptCourse.description: Understand how to handle user interactions like clicks and key presses with events.

HTMLCourse.name: Advanced HTML Forms and Validation
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to create advanced forms with built-in validation and custom input types.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Web Storage
HTMLCourse.description: Explore how to store data locally in the browser using HTML5 Web Storage.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Canvas: Drawing Graphics
HTMLCourse.description: Discover how to use the HTML5 Canvas element to draw and animate graphics.

HTMLCourse.name: Embedding SVG in HTML
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to embed scalable vector graphics (SVG) directly into HTML.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Geolocation API
HTMLCourse.description: Understand how to use the HTML5 Geolocation API to get a user’s location.

HTMLCourse.name: Responsive Images with HTML5
HTMLCourse.description: Learn techniques for optimizing and serving responsive images in HTML5.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Audio and Video: Advanced Features
HTMLCourse.description: Explore the advanced features of embedding and controlling media with HTML5.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Drag and Drop API
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to implement drag-and-drop functionality in your web applications.

HTMLCourse.name: HTML5 Web Workers
HTMLCourse.description: Discover how to use Web Workers to run scripts in the background for better performance.

HTMLCourse.name: Using ARIA for Web Accessibility
HTMLCourse.description: Learn how to use ARIA attributes to improve web accessibility for users with disabilities.

CSSCourse.name: Advanced CSS Selectors
CSSCourse.description: Learn to use advanced CSS selectors like pseudo-classes, pseudo-elements, and attribute selectors.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Variables (Custom Properties)
CSSCourse.description: Discover how to use CSS variables to create reusable and maintainable styles.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Grid: Advanced Layout Techniques
CSSCourse.description: Master advanced CSS Grid techniques for creating complex layouts with ease.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Flexbox: Advanced Alignment and Ordering
CSSCourse.description: Learn advanced Flexbox techniques for controlling the alignment and ordering of elements.

CSSCourse.name: Responsive Design: Advanced Media Queries
CSSCourse.description: Use advanced media queries to create highly responsive web designs.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Animations: Keyframes and Transitions
CSSCourse.description: Explore the power of CSS animations using keyframes and transitions for dynamic effects.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Shapes and Clipping
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to create complex shapes and apply clipping paths in CSS.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Grid and Flexbox Combined
CSSCourse.description: Understand how to combine CSS Grid and Flexbox for flexible, responsive layouts.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Transforms: 2D and 3D Transformations
CSSCourse.description: Learn how to apply 2D and 3D transformations to elements for advanced visual effects.

CSSCourse.name: CSS Architecture: BEM and OOCSS
CSSCourse.description: Discover CSS methodologies like BEM (Block Element Modifier) and OOCSS (Object-Oriented CSS) for scalable and maintainable code.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript ES6: New Features and Syntax
JavaScriptCourse.description: Explore the new features introduced in ES6, including let, const, arrow functions, and more.

JavaScriptCourse.name: Asynchronous JavaScript: Promises and Async/Await
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how to handle asynchronous code using Promises and the modern async/await syntax.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Closures and Scope
JavaScriptCourse.description: Understand the concept of closures, scope, and how they are used in JavaScript.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Modules: Import and Export
JavaScriptCourse.description: Discover how to organize code with JavaScript modules using the import/export syntax.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Event Loop and Concurrency
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how JavaScript’s event loop works and how it handles concurrency.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Prototypes and Inheritance
JavaScriptCourse.description: Dive deep into JavaScript’s prototype-based inheritance model and how it differs from class-based inheritance.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Error Handling: try/catch and Custom Errors
JavaScriptCourse.description: Master error handling in JavaScript with try/catch and creating custom error objects.

JavaScriptCourse.name: Advanced DOM Manipulation
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn advanced techniques for manipulating the Document Object Model (DOM) with JavaScript.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Design Patterns
JavaScriptCourse.description: Understand popular design patterns in JavaScript for writing clean, maintainable code.

JavaScriptCourse.name: JavaScript Memory Management and Optimization
JavaScriptCourse.description: Learn how JavaScript handles memory and techniques to optimize performance and memory usage.
